name: Gubata
description:
Gubata, your beloved puzzle game is released.

Have you ever played rock-paper-scissor game ? it's fun to play it with your friends, and now we create a game of rock-paper-scissor that you can play alone !. So what are you waiting for ?

Lets get the highest score ever !

---------------------------------------------------------------

Gubata, sebuah puzzle game yang akan membuatmu ketagihan.

Kamu pasti pernah main gunting batu kertas kan ? paling enak memang dimainkan bersama teman teman.

Tapi jangan khawatir, kami telah membuat Gubata. Game yang akan membuat kamu ketagihan bermain suit!

Ayo raih score tertinggi !

---------------------------------------------------------------
